thread.title: Jewish groups object to GOP’s treatment of Muslim candidate for Court of Appeals seat – Baptist News Global
thread.title_full: Jewish groups object to GOP’s treatment of Muslim candidate for Court of Appeals seat – Baptist News Global

author: BNG staff
title: Jewish groups object to GOP’s treatment of Muslim candidate for Court of Appeals seat – Baptist News Global
text: [Jewish Telegraphic Agency](https://www.jta.org/2023/12/27/politics/jewish-groups-object-to-gops-treatment-of-muslim-candidate-for-court-of-appeals-seat) A number of national Jewish groups have come to the defense of a Muslim judicial nominee, saying Republican lawmakers inappropriately grilled him about his views on terrorism, Israel and antisemitism. [Exclude from home page](https://baptistnews.com/category/exclude-from-home-page/) [BNG staff](https://baptistnews.com/article/author/bngstaff/) | December 29, 2023 A number of national Jewish groups have come to the defense of a Muslim judicial nominee, saying Republican lawmakers inappropriately grilled him about his views on terrorism, Israel and antisemitism.
